column2: "Hey peon. That's right, you there peon! I don't want to bother looking up your name, so I'll call you peon!"
"So peon, do you need any help with anything? For today only I might help you with it."
"... What? You don't need any help? That can't be. There has to be something."
"That person always says, \"Everybody has something they need help with\"."
"It's written on your face, peon! There is definitely something troubling you!"
"Okay, fine then. Trying to help people isn't my area of expertise anyway!"
"No one is telling me what's troubling them. Am I troublesome?"
"I'm going to blow stuff up to make myself feel better and then go home."
